Text:
The Weight Of Chains / Tezina lanaca (2011)

"Tezina lanaca" je kanadski dokumentarni film Suboticanina Borisa Malagurskog koji kriticki posmatra ulogu SAD, NATO i Evropske unije u tragicnom raspadu Jugoslavije. Film obiluje nikad prikazanim arhivskim snimcima i intervjuima sa akademicima, diplomatama i gradjanima otkrivajuci nerasvetljene cinjenice perioda raspada SFRJ.

TALK - MICHAEL PARENTI - THE U.S. WAR ON YUGOSLAVIA....type it or copy paste on YOU TUBE.


Michael Parenti is an internationally known award-winning author and lecturer. He is one of the nationâs (USA) leading progressive political analysts. His highly informative and entertaining books and talks have reached a wide range of audiences in North America and abroad.
